metadata.synopsis: Ilderin spent the attack locked in a bunker and we're speaking to her after successfully defeating the goblins. Despite having been saved by us, she is pious and unwelcoming.

0.speaker: 300edf9c-c71a-43db-925e-a2953a4e6203
0.text: This is a holy sanctuary, not a bazaar. Please leave.

1.speaker: 300edf9c-c71a-43db-925e-a2953a4e6203
1.text: You've exhausted the goodwill of this place. Leave, before you bring more danger.
